``` ::: ::: ## Time Series Patterns ### Trend Long-term increase or decrease in the data. ### Seasonal A seasonal pattern exists when a series is influenced by seasonal factors (e.g., the quarter of the year, the month, or day of the week). Seasonality is always of a fixed and known period. Hence, seasonal time series are sometimes called periodic time series. Period is unchanging and associated with some aspect of the calendar. ## Time Series Patterns (cont) ### Cyclic A cyclic pattern exists when data exhibit rises and falls that are not of fixed period. The duration of these fluctuations is usually of at least 2 years. In general, the average length of cycles is longer than the length of a seasonal pattern. the magnitude of cycles tends to be more variable than the magnitude of seasonal patterns ## Example: trend ![](time/trend.png) ## Example: seasonal ![](time/seasonal.png) ## Example: multiple seasonality ![](time/ms.png) ## Example: Trend + Seasonal ![](time/trendsea.png) ## Cyclic ![](time/cyclic.png) ## Cyclic + Seasonal ![](time/cs.png) ## Yearly variation ::: {.cell execution_count=23} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(airpassenger, aes(x='year', y='#Passengers', color='factor(year)'))+ geom_point()+ geom_boxplot(alpha=0.5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](file1_files/figure-revealjs/cell-24-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=23} ``` ``` ::: ::: # `pandas` Time Series: index by time ## Index - Yearly **Method 1** ::: {.cell execution_count=24} ``` {.python .cell-code} index1 = pd.DatetimeIndex(['2012', '2013', '2014', '2015', '2016']) data1 = pd.Series([123, 39, 78, 52, 110], index=index1) data1 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=24} ``` 2012-01-01 123 2013-01-01 39 2014-01-01 78 2015-01-01 52 2016-01-01 110 dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Yearly (cont.) **Method 2** `freq='AS'` for start of year ::: {.cell execution_count=25} ``` {.python .cell-code} index2 = pd.date_range("2012", periods=5, freq='AS') index2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25} ``` DatetimeIndex(['2012-01-01', '2013-01-01', '2014-01-01', '2015-01-01', '2016-01-01'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='AS-JAN') ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=26} ``` {.python .cell-code} data2 = pd.Series([123, 39, 78, 52, 110], index=index2) data2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26} ``` 2012-01-01 123 2013-01-01 39 2014-01-01 78 2015-01-01 52 2016-01-01 110 Freq: AS-JAN, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Yearly (cont.) **Method 3** `freq='A'` end of year frequency ::: {.cell execution_count=27} ``` {.python .cell-code} index3 = pd.date_range("2012", periods=5, freq='A') index3 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27} ``` DatetimeIndex(['2012-12-31', '2013-12-31', '2014-12-31', '2015-12-31', '2016-12-31'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='A-DEC') ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=28} ``` {.python .cell-code} data3 = pd.Series([123, 39, 78, 52, 110], index=index3) data3 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28} ``` 2012-12-31 123 2013-12-31 39 2014-12-31 78 2015-12-31 52 2016-12-31 110 Freq: A-DEC, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Yearly (cont.) **Method 4** Annual indexing with arbitrary month ::: {.cell execution_count=29} ``` {.python .cell-code} index4 = pd.date_range("2012", periods=5, freq='AS-NOV') index4 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=29} ``` DatetimeIndex(['2012-11-01', '2013-11-01', '2014-11-01', '2015-11-01', '2016-11-01'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='AS-NOV') ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=30} ``` {.python .cell-code} data4 = pd.Series([123, 39, 78, 52, 110], index=index4) data4 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30} ``` 2012-11-01 123 2013-11-01 39 2014-11-01 78 2015-11-01 52 2016-11-01 110 Freq: AS-NOV, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Yearly (cont.) ::: {.cell execution_count=31} ``` {.python .cell-code} index = pd.period_range('2012-01', periods=8, freq='A') index ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=31} ``` PeriodIndex(['2012', '2013', '2014', '2015', '2016', '2017', '2018', '2019'], dtype='period[A-DEC]', freq='A-DEC') ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Monthly **Method 1** ::: {.cell execution_count=32} ``` {.python .cell-code} index = pd.period_range('2022-01', periods=8, freq='M') index ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=32} ``` PeriodIndex(['2022-01', '2022-02', '2022-03', '2022-04', '2022-05', '2022-06', '2022-07', '2022-08'], dtype='period[M]', freq='M') ``` ::: ::: **Method 2** ::: {.cell execution_count=33} ``` {.python .cell-code} index = pd.period_range(start='2022-01-01', end='2022-08-02', freq='M') index ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=33} ``` PeriodIndex(['2022-01', '2022-02', '2022-03', '2022-04', '2022-05', '2022-06', '2022-07', '2022-08'], dtype='period[M]', freq='M') ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Quarterly ::: {.cell execution_count=34} ``` {.python .cell-code} index = pd.period_range('2022-01', periods=8, freq='Q') index ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=34} ``` PeriodIndex(['2022Q1', '2022Q2', '2022Q3', '2022Q4', '2023Q1', '2023Q2', '2023Q3', '2023Q4'], dtype='period[Q-DEC]', freq='Q-DEC') ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Daily ::: {.cell execution_count=35} ``` {.python .cell-code} index = pd.period_range('2022-01-01', periods=8, freq='D') index ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=35} ``` PeriodIndex(['2022-01-01', '2022-01-02', '2022-01-03', '2022-01-04', '2022-01-05', '2022-01-06', '2022-01-07', '2022-01-08'], dtype='period[D]', freq='D') ``` ::: ::: ## Index - Hourly **Range of hourly timestamps** ::: {.cell execution_count=36} ``` {.python .cell-code} pd.period_range('2022-01', periods=8, freq='H') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=36} ``` PeriodIndex(['2022-01-01 00:00', '2022-01-01 01:00', '2022-01-01 02:00', '2022-01-01 03:00', '2022-01-01 04:00', '2022-01-01 05:00', '2022-01-01 06:00', '2022-01-01 07:00'], dtype='period[H]', freq='H') ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=37} ``` {.python .cell-code} pd.date_range('2022-01', periods=8, freq='H') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=37} ``` DatetimeIndex(['2022-01-01 00:00:00', '2022-01-01 01:00:00', '2022-01-01 02:00:00', '2022-01-01 03:00:00', '2022-01-01 04:00:00', '2022-01-01 05:00:00', '2022-01-01 06:00:00', '2022-01-01 07:00:00'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq='H') ``` ::: ::: **Sequence of durations increasing by an hour** ::: {.cell execution_count=38} ``` {.python .cell-code} pd.timedelta_range(0, periods=10, freq='H') ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=38} ``` TimedeltaIndex(['0 days 00:00:00', '0 days 01:00:00', '0 days 02:00:00', '0 days 03:00:00', '0 days 04:00:00', '0 days 05:00:00', '0 days 06:00:00', '0 days 07:00:00', '0 days 08:00:00', '0 days 09:00:00'], dtype='timedelta64[ns]', freq='H') ``` ::: ::: ##
